Message:
What started as one
unbeatable demon
turned into an infinite
horde that poured out
of the crater.

Even though the world
was now coming to an end,

If a witch’s power
comes from her heart,
then his comes from
the bonds he has
with others.

The man loved by people
all over the world took
the staff of hope and
released every last
ounce of its power.

The light that poured out
from the Staff bathes the
land like the morning sun.

This power from God purges
the demons and sends them
straight back to Hell.

But, it was too much power
for a single human to endure.

But, he didn’t even notice
his own predicament—

Because my body had also
began losing its strength.

How can you worry
about anyone else
at a time like this...?

That’s how you are,
and that’s why I chose to
devote my entire life to you.

Please allow me
to stay by your side
till the very end.
